Padumā：1．PadumāChief of the women patrons of Anomadassī Buddha．Bu．viii．24．

2．PadumāChief of the lay women supporters of Sujāta Buddha．Bu．xiii．30．

3．PadumāMother of Tissa Buddha．Bu．xviii．16．

4．PadumāChief of women patrons of Phussa Buddha．Bu．xix．21； J．i．40．

5．PadumāOne of the chief women disciples of Sikhī Buddha．Bu．xxi．21； J．i．41．

6．PadumāWife of Dipankara Buddha，in his last lay life．Bu．ii．209； Mbv．p．4．

7．PadumāOne of the most distinguished lay women，followers of the Buddha （A．iv．347）．She was the wife of Mendaka and her full name was Candapadumā （q．v．）．

8．PadumāA distinguished Therī of Ceylon．Dpv．xviii．24．

9．PadumāOne of the chief women disciples of Metteyya Buddha．Anāgat．，vs．98．
